ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I detest a monk who will not sell their wares at discounted prices to at least other monks.  How much money do monks really need?  Definately not as much as
ygData.messageBody:
I detest a monk who will not sell their wares at discounted prices to at
least other monks. How much money do monks really need? Definately not as
much as that warrior are especially a cleric. Do each other a favor and
sell it to them at bargain basement prices, or even just GIVE it to them.
Oh well. good luck.,


> I have to agree with this .. Monks really do have the p*** taken out of
them
> because everyone knows they need netted armour and upwards, but I have to
> say that I am yet to meet a fellow monk that shares the same thoughts. I
> managed to get myself a full set of netted from a troll for 4pp al that
was
> missing was the gloves .. which I expected to pay up to 2pp for, even
though
> I begrudge paying it .. Imagine my supprise when I auctioned for a pair
and
> a fellow monk offered me some for "Oh the least I will take is 10pp" ..
this
> was on Erollisi Marr server
